data.title: Worth the wait!
data.text: I've been several times now and the food has been very good but because it has always been busy, it can take 15-20 minutes for a takeout dinner. Be patient - it's worth the wait!

data.title: Best Mexican Food.
data.text: Been coming here for 10 years. Amazing food.  Some of, if not the best Mexican food in town. When I travel, I search for tacos to compete, and El Caporal always holds its own.

data.title: Authentic Mexican Food
data.text:
VERY affordable! Place is always hopping. Make everything from scratch to order. Highly recommend the Alhambre? I know when I see it on the menu!  Plate consists of rice, guac, refried beans, lettuce, tomato, 
chicken, beef or shrimp (we usually get the deluxe plate, which comes with all 3) and a foil wrapped pouch of freshly made, soft, warm corn tortillas. Usually 5, but just ask for extras when you order and they'll throw them in no charge. My wife and I usually split an order, there's that much. OH! And make sure you ask for the grilled veggies (also no charge) Grilled green onions, radish slices and jalapenos. Also, try their Horchada. Sweetened rice milk, VERY delicious. We get cravings for this place, it's THAT good! We had never tried beef tongue before, and she brought us a very generous portion to try - No charge. Can't praise this place enough.

data.title: Horrible -0
data.text: Walked in, seated ourselves as directed, all empty tables were dirty so chose the cleanest of them. Waited over 10 mins for someone to come out and wipe down the table and another few for them to bring menus. Ordered drinks and again waited for them for well over 5 mins & then she brought me the wrong drink. Ordered and waited 25 mins for 4 tacos & a gordita. When the tacos arrived after 25 mins they were wrong again! Worst excuse for a gordita I have ever seen. This place serves food far from Authentic. Horrible service and horrible food. I WILL NEVER RECOMMEND THIS PLACE EVER!!!

data.title: autentic mexican restaurant
data.text: You can find real Mexican food, prepared by Mexicans . The staff is very friendly .The food is delicious.

data.title: Authentic and delicious
data.text: We ate the Tacos Darados (I think that was the correct spelling). It was a fried taco, basically.  YUM! At about 7:30ish tonight this place was VERY busy but the staff was friendly and hard working. I will definitely go again!

data.title: Best Mexican food in grand Rapids
data.text: Best place to eat at an affordable price. Go there at least once a week. Fast and friendly service. Always busy around lunch time. But they are quick to get your order out.

data.title: Torta is a must!
data.text: Oh my, I have never tried a Mexican sandwich till I tried one here and I'm addicted! Everything from the bread to the seasoned meat to the avocado slices on it make this sandwich amazing! I have been here many times, anytime I have to travel to Grand Rapids I try to stop here for lunch or get some Torta's to go! They have good tacos too but I can't veer away from their sandwiches (torta's)!!!

data.title: Real Mexican food
data.text: Authentic Mexican food. Red salsa was very good. We got a large cup of it to go. Order the burritos dry and ask for their red salsa on the side to put over it. The green salsa is great too!

data.title: Sabor mexicano
data.text: Fuimos un grupo de amigos por primera vez y fue genial . las comidas tienen un sabor exquisitos y auténticos las porciones son bien grandes y listas para ser compartidas .  un lugar para todo tipo de publico. Me encantaría regresar y les exhortos al que pueda los visite no se arrepentirán
